verbs.description: First Lady Melania Trump [V: has] n't appeared in public for a month . Her Twitter account says she 's fine , but the statement she tweeted is in President Donald Trump 's signature style , bashing the media and using the same phrases he frequently tweets . People are speculating about what happened .
